text: Despite getting our hopes up that Selena Gomez and Justin Bieber were about to make their first public outing as a couple at NYFW, the pair have actually stayed in Los Angeles. Well done, guys, you duped us. From the looks of things, the pair enjoyed a romantic staycation on the West Coast as they were photographed together over the weekend at Laguna Beach. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Fans caught sight of the pair at the beach, looking into the distance and contemplating life, as they wore matching nude - coloured tones. In another snap, the couple - who were rumoured to have began dating again in November 2017 - were snapped by eagle - eyed fans at Laguna Beach's Montage hotel. We're not going to lie, we're a bit
